EmailTemplate.name: ROLL-OUT: Travel Instructions for Sales Mgmt to Hoffman
EmailTemplate.subject: Please book airfare to Hoffman Estates for 7/26-7/28 - Instructions Below
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your classroom training session, Effective Sales Management Using Salesforce.com, is scheduled to begin at 8am on Tuesday, July 27th. On Wednesday, July 28th, we will conclude classroom training at 12noon with box lunches provided.
Your hotel is being reserved in Hoffman Estates as part of a group reservation. You will receive confirmation of your hotel stay in the coming week.
Please consider the following points when making travel reservations:
(1) Airfare needs to be booked at the most economical rate possible, and (2) Rental cars should not be reserved or rented. Transportation to/from O'hare airport will be coordinated via shared taxis and transportation between the hotel and SHC headquarters will be provided by the hotel.
Please book your airfare by Monday, July 12th. Instructions to book your travel are provided below:
STEP 1: Click Below to access the Travel Portal https://sso.searshc.com/auth.php?p=ccr (use your enterprise ID and password)
STEP 2: Click on the “Travel” Link in the Top Tool Bar *(very important!)
STEP 3: Click on "Meetings" Link in the Top Tool Bar
STEP 4: Select the Meeting that you have been invited for (Salesforce.com for Sales Management) to begin the registration and travel booking process.
STEP 5: The Meeting Registration will now begin, please follow the steps as you will be prompted to book travel if needed.
*It's very important that you click on the Travel and Meetings Link in the Top Tool Bar AND to select this particular meeting. If you book through the regular front page of the travel web site it will not pre-fill in the pertinent meeting OR billing information for this particular meeting. There is no way to reverse a charge if you do not follow these instructions.
Please accept my apology for the late delivery of these travel instructions. Your prompt action is appreciated.
Best, {!User.FirstName}
Sears Commercial has partnered with Salesforce.com to bring the world’s leading sales enablement technology to its Account Managers. Go to http://login.salesforce.com to begin seeing the positive impact in sales revenues which has been achieved by Salesforce.com customers across its base of over 77,500 companies and over 2,000,000 sales users.
